summary: Our Vinyl Weighs a Ton is a feature-length documentary about avant-garde Los Angeles-based record label Stones Throw Records. The film weaves together rare concert footage, never-before-see... See full summary »

title: Our Vinyl Weighs a Ton: This Is Stones Throw Records
